entry.title: Taylor 8756 - Two Flavour Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine - 1 Phase, Water-Cooled, 18 Gallon Capacity (Work in Progress)
entry.summary:
Vendor: N/A
Type: Used Equipment
Price: 16995.00

This Taylor 8756 is a work in progress. "Work in progress" means that the machine is slated for reconditioning, but is not the top priority. Upon purchase, the machine moves to the top of the queue. We don't guarantee an exact time when the reconditioning process will be finished, but it'll typically be finished in two to three weeks.

The Taylor 8756 is a soft serve freezer. It's able to dispense all popular soft serve variations: low or non-fat ice creams, custards, yogurt, sorbet, etc. With it you can serve two soft serve flavours or an equal combination of both.

Other key features of the Taylor 8756 are its large storage capacity -- it has two, 9 gallon mix tanks -- and electronic, easy-to-use controls and locking casters. Also , its door interlock system prevents the operator from injury as the beater will not operated without the dispensing door in place.

      • Work in progress (reconditioned upon purchase)
      • Able to dispense all the popular soft serve variations
      • Large storage capacity -- two, 9 gallon mix tanks

entry.title: Vulcan VG40 - 46" Modular Gas Tilting Braising Pan (Reconditioned)
entry.summary:
Vendor: N/A
Type: Used Equipment
Price: 12500.00

The Vulcan VG40 is a modular gas tilting braising pan with a 46" wide open base. It can be operated manually by a pan tilting mechanism with a removable handle. There's one 30,000 BTU/hr burner per 12" of pan width.

The pan itself can be emptied completely with approximately 30 crank revolutions. It has solid state controls, and requires a 120/60/1 power supply with 9.0 amps. Lastly, this machine has been certified reconditioned by our team of inhouse service technicians. It's ready for a new home!

      • Stainless steel front, back, and sides; 12" stainless steel legs with adjustable flanged feet
      • Front hinged polished stainless steel pan body with coved interior corners and embossed gallon markings
      • 30,000 BTU/hr per 12" of pan width
      • Pan can be emptied with 30 crank revolutions
      • Solid state controls
      • 120/60/1 power supply with 9.0 amps
